page.title: 19THE POLICE FORCE.
page.content: During the 1985 summer term we have had the police in our school for a fortnight telling us about their work. They began by telling us about the ordinary constable what he wears and what he does.They also told us about police woman and one came into see us. We were told that to join the police in our area.If you were a man you had to be 5ft,8 inches tall, well built, and not to have a criminal record.We saw all different types of police work like,the drivers,the dog section and their dogs,a police horse,a patrol car and a motor cycle from the traffic division.On one afternoon they showed us a film warning us never to go with strangers.Another thing they did was to bring in a Cleveland Transit bus which our school adopted and it had our name on it.
